label: Figure 2
caption: CT head showing tumor arising from skin overlying the scalp

label: Figure 3
caption: (A) Stromal hyalinization (HandE, 100x). (B) Cells with clear cytoplasm (HandE, 100x). (C) Polygonal cells with round to oval nuclei and eosinophilic cytoplasm and ducts (arrow) (HandE, 200x)

label: Figure 1a
caption: Fine-needle aspiration smears showing cohesive cell clusters of malignant cells composed of two cell population; polyhedral cells with dense basophilic cytoplasm along with cells with clear cytoplasm. (MGG stain, ×200)

label: Figure 1b
caption: High power view revealing highly pleomorphic atypical basaloid cells, bi- and multinucleated tumor cells with atypical mitotic figure (arrow). (MGG stain, ×400)

label: Figure 1c
caption: Gross photograph showing a well-circumscribed mass covered with ulcerated skin

label: Figure 1d
caption: Tissue section depicting solid lobules of tumor cells showing two cell population. (H and E stain, ×40)

label: Figure 2
caption: Tissue section showing highly pleomorphic tumor cells with clear cytoplasm. Note numerous atypical mitotic figures. (H and E stain, × 400) Inset shows high glycogen content of clear cells. (Periodic acid- schiff stain, ×400)

label: Figure 1
caption: A) Preoperative clinical picture, B) Follow up after 1 year showing well healed surgical site.

label: Figure 2
caption: T2 weighted Contrast enhanced MRI showing lesion (asterisk) & loss of fat planes with parotid tissue (black arrow).

label: Figure 3
caption: A. Incision Markings. B. Skin defect after excision of tumor. C. Excised specimen.

label: Figure 1
caption: Macroscopy shows whitish, oval shaped specimen measuring around 1.5×1 cm (inset: cut section showed a cystic cavity with yellow viscous fluid)

label: Figure 2
caption: Tumor exhibiting cellular areas and cystic spaces (H and E, ×40)

label: Figure 3
caption: Tumor composed of two cell population of epidermoid and clear cells. Epidermoid cells show faintly eosinophillic granular cytoplasm and clear cell are large round with small dark nuclei lining duct like spaces (H and E, ×100)

label: Figure 4
caption: Cystic epithelium consisting of 2-3 layers of cuboidal cells (H and E, ×40)

label: Figure 5
caption: Connective tissue stroma showing melanin pigment and inflammatory cell infiltrate (H and E, ×100)
